name: Zeliria Sanctuary 2. Xinori Asylum
description:
Zeliria was only a reservation created by aliens. But now the Wall of Rejection has fallen, and Maxx and Humkey have to figure out what is happening outside the borders of the Sanctuary. What kind of aliens arrived at the deserted Salangan? Why did APOSTLE allow them to settle here? And what are their goals? Will the meeting with them be a battle or peaceful contact of the inhabitants of different worlds?
Answers to these and many other questions wait for you in the second part of our story - the game Zeliria Sanctuary 2: Xinori Asylum. Here you will find not only new heroes and new events, but also learn more about past events. The Pharoses and their influence on the world, the place of our Earth in the Universe, the relationship between amount of fresh cabbage and stability of interspecific ties. All these you will find out in Xinori Asylum.
You will find a lot of new and interesting, but do not forget - everything here is not what it seems at first glance!

Our visual novel combines fantasy, drama, romance, humor, thriller, and of course beautiful girls and fluffy (not)humster.

Languages: English and Russian
